name: Egg and Nest Puzzle - Getting the Jeweled Egg
title: Egg and Nest Puzzle - Getting the Jeweled Egg
description: Climb tree and retrieve jewel-encrusted egg from bird's nest

entries.expectedOutput: [Expected output for navigation north from West of House to Forest]
entries.notes: Navigate north from West of House to Forest

entries.expectedOutput: [Expected output for navigation north in Forest]

entries.notes: Climb up tree to reach nest

entries.expectedOutput: [Expected output for taking jeweled egg from nest]
entries.notes: Take jeweled egg from bird's nest

entries.expectedOutput: [Expected output for climbing down from tree]
entries.notes: Climb down from tree back to Forest

expectedBehavior.forest: Forest with trees in all directions, sunlight to the east
expectedBehavior.upATree: About 10 feet above ground, nestled among large branches
expectedBehavior.nest: Small bird's nest beside you on the branch
expectedBehavior.egg: Large egg encrusted with precious jewels in the nest
expectedBehavior.note: Egg cannot be opened directly - must give to thief or let thief steal it

notes: Egg is worth 5 points as treasure
Egg contains a clockwork canary (6 points) but cannot be opened by player
To open egg: give to thief, kill thief, retrieve opened egg
Winding canary while up in tree summons songbird who drops brass bauble (1 point)
This is one of the simplest puzzles - no combat or complex navigation needed

metadata.conversionNote: Converted from 'commands' format to 'entries' format - expectedOutput fields need to be populated
